describing art as "degenerate" because it expresses sexuality is not just
classic American Puritanism, it is [full-on Nazi shit]

[full-on Nazi shit]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Degenerate_art

  <p>The developers behind _Palworld_ have re-revealed their furry high school
  dating sim (almost) nobody asked for. It’s called <em>Pal♡world! ~More Than
  Just Pals~</em> and was almost certainly an April Fools’ joke the first time
  <a
  href="https://kotaku.com/palworld-dating-sim-april-fools-day-trailer-joke-1851379228">it
  was teased in 2024</a>, but might actually be a real thing now?</p>
{% endgenericPost %}

It's also quietly racist (as Nazi stuff tends to be when it's not being loudly
racist) to frame an archetypically Japanese genre as intrinsically icky. I know
present-day Kotaku is even more of a rag than it was historically, but this is
particularly disgusting.
